2.text: This Data Processing Addendum (“DPA”) supplements the processor controller Agreement available at as updated from time to time between controller and processor, or other agreement between controller and processor governing controller’s use of the Service Offerings (the “Agreement”) when the GDPR applies to your use of the processor Services to process controller Data.

3.text: This DPA is an agreement between you and the entity you represent (“controller”, “you” or “your”) and the applicable Amazon Web Services contracting entity under the Agreement (“processor”).

4.text: Unless otherwise defined in this DPA or in the Agreement, all capitalised terms used in this DPA will have the meanings given to them in Section 17 of this DPA.

7.text: This DPA applies when controller Data is processed by processor.

8.text: In this context, processor will act as “processor” to controller who may act either as “controller” or “processor” with respect to controller Data (as each term is defined in the GDPR).

10.text: The Services provide controller with a number of controls, including security features and functionalities, that controller may use to retrieve, correct, delete or restrict controller Data as described in the Documentation.

11.text: Without prejudice to Section 5.1, controller may use these controls as technical and organisational measures to assist it in connection with its obligations under the GDPR, including its obligations relating to responding to requests from data subjects.

14.text: The subject matter of the data processing under this DPA is controller Data.

16.text: As between processor and controller, the duration of the data processing under this DPA is determined by controller.

18.text: The purpose of the data processing under this DPA is the provision of the Services initiated by controller from time to time.
